maxpower.kernel
Class LargeStreamOffset<T extends com.maxeler.maxcompiler.v2.kernelcompiler.types.KernelObjectVectorizable<T,?>>

java.lang.Object
  com.maxeler.maxcompiler.v2.kernelcompiler.KernelLib
      maxpower.kernel.LargeStreamOffset<T>

public class LargeStreamOffset<T extends com.maxeler.maxcompiler.v2.kernelcompiler.types.KernelObjectVectorizable<T,?>>
extends com.maxeler.maxcompiler.v2.kernelcompiler.KernelLib

A large fixed offset using LMem to reduce FMem usage. N.B. The position in LMem can altered via the burst offset scalar.
